reviewtext: This is a fun little device to put in my mp3 player, a Samsung YP-700H.  It also works in PDA's perfectly, because a friend of mine has one with this exact same memory card.  I can only assume it works fine with digital cam's.  As far as mp3 players go, this is sure to work.  If you have a low memory mp3 player, get this if it can expand.  It works wonders.
